name: Matla
desc: A renowned witch doctor from the Masters of the Night-Wind, known for his meticulous care and sense of responsibility

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As a doctor, Matla occasionally encounters patients suffering from chronic ailments. He always begins with a thorough diagnosis, then addresses each problem step by step. It's said that his Genius Invokation TCG strategy was born from these very experiences.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Each time you fail to see through a Whopperflower's disguise: All your characters take 2 Pyro DMG.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
